paper_abstract: We show that the termination of Mohri's algorithm is decidable for polynomially ambiguous weighted finite automata over the tropical semiring which gives a partial answer to a question by Mohri [29]. The proof relies on an improvement of the notion of the twins property and a Burnside type characterization for the finiteness of the set of states produced by Mohri's algorithm.
paper_title: A Burnside approach to the termination of Mohri's algorithm for polynomially ambiguous min-plus-automata
